content: this is just a square in the pattern you can view more information at http //jessecreations wordpress com/2008/07/01/back-to-what-i-know/ i am making this into a baby blanket by making several squares like this and then some green and sewing them together checkerboard-style i think it would also make a nice dishcloth by just adding a green border to it or something like that maybe a bag or a coin purse
